kindred.client.model

Class Game

  • Object
    • kindred.client.model.Game

  • public class Game
extends Object
    Represents a game match where two Players battle against each other.
    Author:
    Kindred Team

    • Field Summary

      Fields 
      Modifier and Type Field and Description
      private boolean isOver
      Stores the status of the match: true if finished, false otherwise.
      private Map map
      Map played by both Players.
      private int team
      ID for the user, identifies which Units are under their control.
      private String terrainFile
      Name of the file containing valid Terrain types.
      private int turn
      Controls which Player is playing at the moment.
      private HashSet<Unit> unitsThatAttacked
      HashSet for all Units that have attacked this turn.
      private HashSet<Unit> unitsThatMoved
      HashSet for all Units that have moved this turn.

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      Game(String nameA, String nameB, String mapFile, int team)
      Constructs a Game with an empty Map.

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Concrete Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      int attack(int xi, int yi, int xf, int yf)
      Makes the Unit on Tile (xi, yi) attack the Unit on Tile (xf, yf), if possible, on the current player's turn.
      boolean causeDamage(int x, int y, int damage)
      Directly causes the specified amount of damage to the Unit on Tile (x, y) of the Map.
      void endTurn()
      Ends the current player's turn, letting the next user take action.
      Map getMap()
      Returns the Map being played in the Game.
      int getTurn()
      Returns the identifier of the current player's turn.
      boolean isOver()
      Returns true if the Game has ended, i.e., one of the players lost all of their Units, or false otherwise.
      boolean move(int xi, int yi, int xf, int yf)
      Moves Unit from the specified team on Tile (xi, yi) to Tile (xf, yf) on this Map during the current player's turn.
      void surrender()
      Makes the current player forfeit the match.

    • Constructor Detail

      • Game

        public Game(String nameA,
            String nameB,
            String mapFile,
            int team)
        Constructs a Game with an empty Map.
        Parameters:
        nameA - playerA's name
        nameB - playerB's name
        mapFile - name of the file containing Map to be played on
        team - user's ID representing which team he will play on

    • Method Detail

      • move

        public boolean move(int xi,
                    int yi,
                    int xf,
                    int yf)
        Moves Unit from the specified team on Tile (xi, yi) to Tile (xf, yf) on this Map during the current player's turn. Supposes that all given coordinates are valid, i.e., not outside borders of this Map.

        Returns true if movement was successful or false otherwise.

        Parameters:
        xi - x coordinate of the Unit to be moved
        yi - y coordinate of the Unit to be moved
        xf - x coordinate of the destination Tile
        yf - y coordinate of the destination Tile
        Returns:
        true, if movement was successful, or false otherwise

      • attack

        public int attack(int xi,
                  int yi,
                  int xf,
                  int yf)
        Makes the Unit on Tile (xi, yi) attack the Unit on Tile (xf, yf), if possible, on the current player's turn. Returns an integer representing damage:
        • If damage = -1, then the attack wasn't possible to be done.
        • If damage ≥ 0, then it represents the damage received by the defending Unit.
        Parameters:
        xi - x coordinate of the attacker
        yi - y coordinate of the attacker
        xf - x coordinate of the defender
        yf - y coordinate of the defender
        Returns:
        damage received by the defending unit if the attack succeeded, or -1 otherwise

      • causeDamage

        public boolean causeDamage(int x,
                           int y,
                           int damage)
        Directly causes the specified amount of damage to the Unit on Tile (x, y) of the Map. Supposes that a Unit exists on the specified Tile. Returns true if the Unit is dead, i.e., has no more hit points left, or false otherwise.
        Parameters:
        x - x coordinate of the Unit that will take damage
        y - y coordinate of the Unit that will take damage
        damage - damage to be caused to the Unit
        Returns:
        true, if the Unit is dead, or false otherwise

      • getMap

        public Map getMap()
        Returns the Map being played in the Game.
        Returns:
        the Map being played in the Game

      • surrender

        public void surrender()
        Makes the current player forfeit the match.

      • endTurn

        public void endTurn()
        Ends the current player's turn, letting the next user take action.

      • isOver

        public boolean isOver()
        Returns true if the Game has ended, i.e., one of the players lost all of their Units, or false otherwise.
        Returns:
        true if the Game ended, or false otherwise

      • getTurn

        public int getTurn()
        Returns the identifier of the current player's turn.
        Returns:
        identifier of the current player's turn
